plays.text: Penalty to Jean-Francois Fortin 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike York

Penalty to Sergei Berezin 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Fernando Pisani

Goal scored by Ethan Moreau assisted by Eric Brewer and Alexei Semenov
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Tripping Sergei Berezin
Goal scored by Mike Comrie assisted by Ryan Smyth and Ales Hemsky
Goal scored by Brendan Witt assisted by Calle Johansson and Robert Lang
Goal scored by Fernando Pisani assisted by Jason Smith and Marty Reasoner
